com.camerontec.util.io

Interface IDataExternalizable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BytesSegment
    Deprecated. 
    This interface and its implementations are likely to be removed in a future release. Usages are likely to be replaced by ExternalizableData.

    @Deprecated
public interface IDataExternalizable
    Interface to be implemented by classes capable of serializing/deserializing themselves to/from java.io.DataOutput and java.io.DataInput respectively.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getDataLength()
      Deprecated. 
      Return the number of bytes to written by writeData(DataOutput).
      void readData(DataInput input)
      Deprecated. 
      Deserialize from the specified java.io.DataInput.
      void writeData(DataOutput output)
      Deprecated. 
      Serialize to the specified java.io.DataOutput.

    • Method Detail

      • getDataLength

        int getDataLength()
        Deprecated. 
        Return the number of bytes to written by writeData(DataOutput).
        Returns:
        The serialized data length in bytes.

      • writeData

        void writeData(DataOutput output)
        throws IOException
        Deprecated. 
        Serialize to the specified java.io.DataOutput.

        The number of bytes written must match the value returned by getDataLength().

        Parameters:
        output - The serialization target.
        Throws:
        IOException - On serialization error.

      • readData

        void readData(DataInput input)
       throws IOException
        Deprecated. 
        Deserialize from the specified java.io.DataInput.
        Parameters:
        input - The deserialization source.
        Throws:
        IOException - On deserialization error.
